cleaned_text: L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula Dry Dog FoodItem PLU: 46303 Share this Product If you're looking for a high-quality, limited ingredient diet for your pup, Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula Dry Dog Food is an excellent choice. This formula is made with real beef as the first ingredient, and is free of grains, corn, wheat, and soy. It also contains a blend of omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids to help support healthy skin and coat. This formula is designed to provide complete and balanced nutrition for adult dogs. It contains all the essential vitamins and minerals your pup needs to stay healthy and active. Plus, it's made with natural ingredients and is free of artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives. The beef and brown rice formula is highly digestible, making it easy for your pup to absorb the nutrients. It also contains prebiotic fiber to help support healthy digestion. And, it's made with high-quality proteins to help maintain strong muscles. Overall, Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula Dry Dog Food is an excellent choice for pups who need a limited ingredient diet. It's made with natural ingredients, is highly digestible, and provides complete and balanced nutrition. Plus, it's free of grains, corn, wheat, and soy, making it a great option for pups with food sensitivities. Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula Dry Dog Food is a complete and balanced diet for adult dogs. This formula is made with a single source of animal protein and is free of grains, potatoes, and other fillers. It is also free of artificial flavors, colors, and preservatives. The beef and brown rice formula is rich in essential vitamins and minerals to help support your dog's overall health and well-being. This formula is also highly digestible and provides your dog with the energy they need to stay active and healthy. Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula Dry Dog Food is the perfect choice for dogs with sensitive stomachs or food allergies. 1. Contains limited ingredients to reduce the risk of food sensitivities. 2. Features real beef as the first ingredient for a high-quality source of protein. 3. Includes brown rice as a source of carbohydrates for energy. 4. Contains omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acids to promote healthy skin and coat. 5. Includes natural sources of fiber to support healthy digestion. 6. Contains no artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives. 7. Formulated to meet the nutritional levels established by the AAFCO Dog Food Nutrient Profiles for all life stages. Sometimes whats NOT in your dogs food is just as important as what is. Thats the guiding philosophy behind Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula, a super premium dry dog food made to help feed your dogs greatness. Our beef and brown rice formula is made without commonly added ingredients like peas, corn, wheat or soy. Instead, you'll find real beef as the #1 ingredient and easily digestible whole grain brown rice. We also added essential vitamins and minerals to provide your adult dog with a complete and balanced diet to help support his nutritional needs. For dogs both big and small, the choice is simple: Natural Balance is what you need to feed them with confidence! Why We Love It - Contains one (1) 12-pound bag of Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Beef & Brown Rice Formula a super premium grain inclusive dog food formulated to meet the unique nutritional needs of your adult dog - #1 ingredient is real beef, which provides essential amino acids that help maintain healthy muscles - Made with wholesome grains, like brown rice, that help provide sustained energy About Natural Balance Natural Balance has stood by their core beliefs since 1989, when Dick Van Patten founded the company with the philosophy of providing pets and their owners the Food for a Lifetime.. Surrounded around four core principles of premium quality ingredients, safety testing, highly trained nutrition experts, and 100% customer satisfaction, Natural Balance has become the most trusted name in pet nutrition. Natural Balance chooses only the tastiest and most nutritious ingredients to formulate their food, including high quality, lean proteins like lamb, venison, salmon and duck, and healthy carbohydrates such as sweet potatoes and garbanzo beans. Not a single Natural Balance formula contains artificial flavors, chemical preservatives, soy, wheat, or corn, by-product meals, or refined grains. Natural Balance is the only pet food company with the Buy With Confidence Program which allows you to see the safety test results of every bag or can of Natural Balance that is made. Every member of Natural Balance's customer care team is a highly trained vet technician with a degree in Animal Health Science. Couple all of these staples together, and the result is a 100% satisfaction guarantee that Natural Balance lives by.
